direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods extend the validity of a listen key for user data streams, but for different types of margin accounts.
Both methods handle isolated margin listen keys with similar control flows and parameter checks.
The extendIsolatedMarginListenKey method depends on the existence of a listen key created by createIsolatedMarginListenKey.
Both methods extend listen keys, but for different types of accounts. Test cases for one can be adapted for the other.
Both methods handle exceptions related to missing or invalid listen keys in a similar manner.
